hero.title: Building Smart Solutions with AI & Code
hero.subtitle: CSE (AIML) student at Chandigarh University passionate about building intelligent, scalable, and user-centric web applications using AI and modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.text1: I’m a Computer Science (AIML) student at Chandigarh University with a strong interest in full-stack development and artificial intelligence. I enjoy building modern web applications that are not only functional, but intelligent, scalable, and user-focused.
about.text2: My journey involves continuously exploring new technologies—from developing responsive React and Next.js frontends to working with backend systems and experimenting with machine learning models. I enjoy learning by building real projects and improving my skills every day.

projects.title: Suroor — Music Streaming Platform (Spotify Clone)
projects.description: Suroor is a full-stack music streaming web application inspired by Spotify. It features user authentication, playlist management, music streaming, and a modern, responsive UI. The project focuses on delivering a smooth user experience while handling real-world frontend and backend challenges.

projects.title: Virtual Healthcare & Appointment Management System
projects.description: A web-based healthcare platform that enables patients to book appointments, consult doctors virtually, and manage medical records online. Designed to improve accessibility and efficiency in healthcare services using secure and scalable web technologies

projects.title: Swasthya — Smart Healthcare & Wellness Platform
projects.description: Swasthya is a smart healthcare and wellness platform designed to improve access to medical services through technology. The system allows users to manage health records, book doctor appointments, and receive basic health guidance through a simple and user-friendly interface. The project focuses on combining healthcare management with modern web technologies for better user experience and accessibility.

resume.summary: Experienced full-stack developer with a focus on AI integration. Proven track record of delivering scalable web applications.
